item.title: Aspose.Words for Python via .NET 21.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for Python via .NET 21.11. Major Features There are 64 improvements and fixes in this release. The most notable are: New UseAttachments option has been implemented to display the attachments panel in the output PDF documents. Added a new ChmLoadOptions to get more control over CHM loading. Added new option to ignore field codes during find-replace operation. Added ability to save images as Base64 string to Markdown format.
